tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) due to the lack of sanitization of the services attribute value. This oversight allows attackers to inject malicious scripts, potentially compromising the security of the application.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `tarteaucitronjs` library to the patch version.
